about_the_game:
[h1]Sumeru[/h1]
Brief introduction：
  • This is a 2D physical game.
  • You can help “Yun” to escape from Sumerian World by drawing a bridge across the cliff , a high-climbing stairs, a hammer to break the door , etc. 
  • There are six levels namely “dreamland”,” forest”, “ice”, “city”, “mountain” and “last task”, and all together 43 scenes in this game.


Story：
A traveler called “Yun” picked up a gem on his way home. But just when he appreciating the fascinating gem, he was inhaled in to inner side of the gem, which is called “Sumerian World”. “Yun” has to overcome all the difficulties and ordeals, then he can go back to his world. A journey, which is full of adventures and surprises begins…
